mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.user_id AS userId, d.mobile AS userMobile, c.id AS friendId, c.nick_name AS nickName, c.pic AS pic, c.mobile AS friendMobile, a.care AS care FROM sst_user_friend AS a JOIN sport_user AS c ON c.id = a.friend_id AND c.stat = 1 JOIN sport_user AS d ON d.id = a.user_id AND d.stat = 1 WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} AND a.stat = 1
